hash.description: The hash of the ledger header which was included in the chain

sequence.description: The sequence number of the ledger (sometimes called the

ledgerCloseTime.description: The timestamp at which the ledger was closed.

headerXdr.description: A base64 encoded string of the raw `LedgerHeader` xdr struct for this ledger.

metadataXdr.description: A base64 encoded string of the raw `LedgerCloseMeta` xdr struct for this ledger.
